actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Research, Gen. Leg.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Agricultural Research and General Legislation

official_title: A bill to amend the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 to prohibit the Secretary of Agriculture from prescribing or collecting fees to cover the cost of providing certain agricultural quarantine and inspection services at a site within the State of Hawaii or the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 to prohibit the Secretary of Agriculture from collecting fees for agricultural quarantine and inspection services in Hawaii or Puerto Rico.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 to prohibit the Secretary of Agriculture from prescribing or collecting fees to cover the cost of providing certain agricultural quarantine and inspection services at a site within the State of Hawaii or the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico, and for other purposes.
